Community Bonding Period

5 Jun 2022
  • Studied the last year GSoC blog at https://theroboticsclub.github.io/gsoc2021-Siddharth_Saha/ and tried to comprehend the deliverables and methodology.

  • Pulled the Docker image of R.A.D.I. 4.2.0 and ran it.
